      • getExecutor

        ExecutorService getExecutor()
        This method is used by all code to create and execute asynchronous tasks.

        Ensure that when calling TaskRunner.runLater(BasePlugin, Runnable, long) or TaskRunner.runTimer(BasePlugin, Runnable, long, long), that this executor returns an instance of ScheduledExecutorService

        Returns:
        the executor of this plugin

      • getExceptionHandler

        ExceptionHandler getExceptionHandler()

      • components

        ComponentLoader[] components()
        Returns:
        the component array to register all of yours components and services.
